activities: Turbine collects personally identifiable information directly from visitors to various Turbine or third party websites via online and mobile devices, for such purposes as to enable registration and support for its virtual worlds and online games; alert consumers to new products, enhancements, upgrade opportunities; for participation in contests, sweepstakes, and promotions; to provide related products and services, as well as to personalize those products and services; to engage in commercial transactions (e.g. billing, account and payment processing); for direct marketing; to analyze data to improve products and services; to detect and prevent fraud; and as required or permitted by law.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
